```{webr-r}
#| context: setup
s <- 1000

theme_set(theme_minimal())

blue <- "#327291"
```

## Design

```{webr-r}
# Parameters
min <- 2
max <- 8
mode <- 6

# Simulate
hours_design <- rpert(n = s, min = min, mode = mode, max = max)

# Visualize
tibble(x = hours_design) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = blue, alpha = .8)
```

## Participant recruitment

```{webr-r}
# Parameters
min <- 2
max <- 8
mode <- 6

# Simulate
hours_recruitment <- rpert(n = s, min = min, mode = mode, max = max)

# Visualize
tibble(x = hours_recruitment) |>

```

## Data analysis

```{webr-r}
# Parameters
min <- 2
max <- 8
mode <- 6

# Simulate
hours_data_analysis <- rpert(n = s, min = min, mode = mode, max = max)

# Visualize
tibble(x = hours_data_analysis) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x)) +

```

# Total hours

```{webr-r}
total_hours <- tibble(
  hours = hours_design + hours_recruitment + hours_data_analysis
)

ggplot(total_hours, aes(x = hours)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = blue, alpha = .8) +
  theme_minimal()
```
